files.patch:
@@ -738,3 +738,1 @@

+  // and mark them as 'old' region(s).
@@ -743,1 +741,1 @@
-  HeapWord* alloc_archive_region(size_t word_size, HeapWord* preferred_addr);
+  HeapWord* alloc_archive_region(size_t word_size);
